::Nightlight/Windlord/Termitron::

Windlord saw the nocturnal landcape said "we should have gone before 
rain had finished that would have helped to cove our trace"

"It's far inside mountains" answered the hwak while he took off in 
robot mode "I suggest that we should fly hurry"

Windlord started flew towards the new base, he tried to flew slowly 
in order to let others follow him whenn others took off he could 
increase the speed;  Nightlight took off with the kids, and followed 
at Windlord.

Termitron Transformed to Robot mode and started to took off
